channel.title: +1 Forward - Friendship, Effort, Victory
channel.description:
https://1forward.libsyn.com/friendship-effort-victory
Rich and Rach bring on Kamala Kara of Far Horizons Co-Op to talk about their shonen battle manga tabletop roleplaying game.
Timecodes: 0:01:20 - Read a Sitch about Telling Stories during Combat Scenes 0:05:51 - Open Your Brain to *Friendship, Effort, Victory* 0:18:35 - Act Under Fire with Plussy and Curtis in the championship match
You can follow Kamara on Twitter @KamalaKaraA1 You can find FEV on the Far Horizon's itch page here: https://far-horizons-co-op.itch.io/fev
